name: sblrc
title: Data for Bayesian Linear Regession with correlated betas.
description: Simulated data with 100 observations and 5 coefficients using an uninformative prior. The true values for beta and sigma is 1 and the betas have a correlation of 0.8 in the posterior and var(beta) = 0.01. See data/data-raw/sblr.R for exact code.
